title: Why aren't there any Vel'Koz and Ryze interactions in the lore?
body:
Vel'Koz is a void creature that searches for knowledge, if I'm correct, and Ryze protects a scroll with powerful spells. Wouldn't Vel'Koz want to read it and learn all the powerful magic spells?? What would happen if he did read it o_O
Also if this is the wrong place to discuss this I would like to apologize in advance!

replies.body: This is correct, and I just want to say I like this idea.
From my understanding, Vel'Koz is trying to get his tentacles on Zilean. The knowledge to manipulate time must be incredibly powerful.

He can't kilean the Zilean though.
http://i.makeagif.com/media/11-03-2015/AWXOCK.gif

Honestly it bugs me that Vel'koz doesn't have any interactions ingame.
He has a few in his battlecast skin,but they could just as well fit his regular one(at least high noon jhin and freljord taliyah have additional lines that are connected to the skin).
Vel wants more scientific knowledge, which is why he disintegrates things with his ult. He breaks them down to a molecular level and studies them like that.
Vel seems more interested in learning about the living things in this world.  He would probably research Ryze, but not really care about the scroll.
I'd say Vel'koz is more into the "science" type of knowledge(piltover/zaun etc) than the arcane type.
He wants Zilean's sweet ass tho
Oh I see now. You guys have some good points!
Just wait for the Ryze champion update, he may get lore that references Vel, or even lines directed toward him.
